Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of the program. It provides a way to readBytes an Ext2 Filesystem image, based on the path that will be provided by the user, as a string.
    Author:
    Petros Soutzis, 2017-19

      • getCurrentPathName

        Parameters:

      • getInputYesNo

        private static boolean getInputYesNo()
        If the user enters anything else than Y/y or N/n, they will be prompted to re-enter their decision.
        Returns:
        true if user enters Y/y, or false if user enters N/n.

      • getCommandAndExecute

        private static void getCommandAndExecute(java.lang.String input,
                                         int inodeSize,
                                         Superblock sBlock,
                                         GroupDescriptor groupDesc,
                                         Ext2File ext2)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        This method will divide the user's input into a command and a target path and execute the given command.
        Parameters:
        input - The user's raw input
        inodeSize - The size of any inode on this FS.
        sBlock - The superblock of this FS.
        groupDesc - The group descriptor of this FS.
        ext2 - The Ext2File instance of the FS.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This is not actually correct, the exception should be handled in Ext2File, but who cares.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
